tokens.resolved_gloss: to spill forth (blood, a libation, liquid metal; or even a solid, i.e. to mound up); also (figuratively) to expend (life, soul, complaint, money, etc.); intensively, to sprawl out
tokens.translation: to spill forth (blood, a libation, liquid metal; or even a solid, i.e. to mound up); also (figuratively) to expend (life, soul, complaint, money, etc.); intensively, to sprawl out

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, voluntary, i.e. generous; hence, magnanimous; as noun, a grandee (sometimes a tyrant)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, containing, i.e. a tube; also a bed or valley of a stream; also a strong thing or a hero
